'''Nightspirit Graffiti''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]].

Each piece of Nightspirit Graffiti is associated with a specific object, or '''Nightspirit Body'''. After using [[Spiritspeaking]] to scan a piece of graffiti, the player can place the corresponding object in the real world using the Elemental Skill button.

Scanning some Nightspirit Graffiti may make objects disappear instead (e.g., rock walls).

==Notable Nightspirit Bodies==
* [[Chest]]
* [[Elemental Amber]]
* [[Exploding Barrel]]
* Nightsoul [[Enemy]]
* [[Tutorial/Painted Stones|Painted Stone]]
* [[Wind Current]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* Moving too far away from the Nightspirit Graffiti will make the corresponding Nightspirit Body disappear.
* Two identical pieces of graffiti may not create the same object. 
* Two identical pieces of graffiti in close proximity may be tied to the same Nightspirit Body.
* Placing a Nightspirit Body for the first time grants the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement ''[[Aparecium]]''.
